if related_simulation_movement_path_list is None:
 raise RuntimeError, 'related_simulation_movement_path_list is missing. Update ERP5 Product.'
 
 packing_list = context
 
 # First, copy Order properties
 packing_list.PackingList_copyOrderProperties()
 
 packing_list = context
 related_order = packing_list.getCausalityValue()
 
 if packing_list.getSimulationState() == 'draft':
 packing_list.edit(
 comment=related_order.getComment(),
 description = related_order.getDescription(),
 delivery_mode=related_order.getDeliveryMode(),
 incoterm=related_order.getIncoterm(),
 source_administration_value=related_order.getSourceAdministrationValue(),
 destination_decision_value=related_order.getDestinationDecisionValue(),
 title=related_order.getTitle()
 )
 
 # If security definitions are implemented on the packing list, it is time to apply them
 packing_list.assignRoleToSecurityGroup()
 
 # Notify assignee
 source_person = context.getSourceValue(portal_type="Person")
 destination_decision_person = context.getDestinationDecisionValue(portal_type="Person")
 if destination_decision_person is None:
 destination_decision_person = context.getDestinationValue(portal_type="Person")
 if source_person is not None:
 if destination_decision_person is not None:
 from_email = destination_decision_person.getDefaultEmailText()
 else:
 from_email = getattr(context, 'email_from_address', None)
 email = source_person.getDefaultEmailValue()
 if email is not None:
 msg = """
 A new task has been assigned to you by %(assignor)s.
 
 This task is named: %(title)s
 
 Description: 
 %(description)s
 
 Start Date: %(start_date)s
 Stop Date: %(stop_date)s
 
 Please wisit ERP5: %(url)s
 """ % {
 'assignor': destination_decision_person.getTitle(),
 'title' : packing_list.getTitle(),
 'url' : '%s/%s/view' % (packing_list.ERP5Site_getAbsoluteUrl(),
 packing_list.getRelativeUrl()),
 'description' : packing_list.getDescription(),
 'start_date': packing_list.getStartDate().Date(),
 'stop_date': packing_list.getStopDate().Date(),
 }
 email.activate().send(from_url = from_email,
 subject="[ERP5 Task] %s" % packing_list.getTitle(), msg = msg)
 
 # Then, modify state
 confirm_tag = '%s_confirm' % packing_list.getPath()
 packing_list.activate(after_path_and_method_id=(related_simulation_movement_path_list,
 ('immediateReindexObject','recursiveImmediateReindexObject')),
 tag=confirm_tag).Delivery_confirm()
 
 # First set the packing_list in the building state
 packing_list.startBuilding()
 # Then an activity should put the causality state in diverged or solved
 packing_list.activate(after_path_and_method_id=(related_simulation_movement_path_list,
 ('immediateReindexObject','recursiveImmediateReindexObject')),
 after_tag=confirm_tag).updateCausalityState()
